name: 陳怡倩
objective:
本課程著重於：(1) 透過適合學生程度的教材，強化學生必備的基礎文法概念和句型結構；(2) 讓學生掌握閱讀要領，深入了解各種寫作技巧，重點在於解釋生字、片語、句法以及分析基本寫作技巧；(3) 熟悉英語使用者的日常生活情境，並學習與未來就業環境相關的會話及適當應對方式。通過練習，增強學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力及表達技巧。

This course aims to (1) strengthen students' essential grammar concepts and sentence structures using materials appropriate for their level; (2) ensure students grasp key reading strategies and fully understand various writing techniques, with an emphasis on the explanation of new words, phrases, syntax, and the analysis of basic writing skills; and (3) familiarize students with everyday situations encountered by English speakers and conversations relevant to their future work environments, including appropriate responses.
Enhance listening, speaking, reading, and writing abilities through practice.
